channel.title: Recommender Systems on Balachandar Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Recommender Systems on Balachandar Blog

item.title: Recommending Reddit communities with Google BigQuery and the implicit library
item.description: Introduction: My previous post looked into most linked domains in popular subreddits across the world. In that exploratary data analysis, I took a cluster of subreddits and did a comparative analysis of how (news-) domains linked, vary in their proportions within that cluster. It gave a glimpse of similar subreddits. To a novice redditor though, it isn’t always clear which subreddits are alike, say, in terms of what they are about (for example, US Politics Wiki-rules), or, in terms of proximity of subreddits, as extrapolated from redditors’ activity.
